room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by Unchained STL in St. Louis
room_address: 221 Spencer Road Suite I Saint Peters, MO 63376
room_description:
The year is 1931 and bank robbers are beginning their villainous sprees across the nation. These bold criminals inspire the likes of the infamous George “Baby Face” Nelson and Bonnie and Clyde. They also capture the attention of authorities ranging from local sheriffs all the way to J. Edgar Hoover, Director of the FBI.
One such nefarious gang has made their way into a rather curious bank vault in a small Missouri town.  The vault was created using an eccentric mix of the high technology of the day, designed to be unbreakable. Your mission is to crack the safe, rob the vault and escape before the authorities catch up with you!
